title: Movies
text:
We are still deciding on which movie to watch… Below are some strong contenders but we would like your input as well! If you are interested in sharing your opinion, please do so when you RSVP!














13 going on 30













Alien













Fargo













Kung Fu Panda













Pineapple Express













Shrek 2













The Usual Suspects













Twilight













WALL-E







No matching items

title: Twilight
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 130min

When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

title: Shrek 2
text:
Release year: 2004
Runtime: 93min

Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona’s parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be

title: Movie title
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 120min

Summary of the movie.

title: Fargo
text:
Release year: 1996
Runtime: 98min

Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard’s inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen’s bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: 13 going on 30
text:
Release year: 2004
Runtime: 98min

Unpopular schoolgirl Jenna Rink makes an unusual wish on her birthday. Miraculously, her wish comes true and the 13-year-old Jenna wakes up the next day as a 30-year-old woman.

title: Big 30
text: Reiko and Noah are celebrating their 30th birthday party with a two-part event and you are invited to join us at both!

title: Big 30
text:
Movie at Mayfair
We’ve rented out Mayfair Theatre for all of you to come share a special movie with us! However, we don’t yet know what that movie will be and we want your help… Check out our options here and vote for your favorites in the RSVP!
Note that the concession stand will be open with snacks for purchase during this showing.

title: Big 30
text:
Cake and Happy Hour
Afterwards, join us in continuing the celebration at CRAFT Beer Market’s happy hour where will will also be serving cake!
RSVP: If you can make it, please RSVP at the this link by August 31st, 2025. The specific details for our two events can be found in the RSVP!

title: Alien
text:
Release year: 1979
Runtime: 117min

After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

title: Kung Fu Panda
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 92min

To everyone’s surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley’s arch-enemy is on his way.

title: Pineapple Express
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 111min

A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer’s boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

title: The Usual Suspects
text:
Release year: 1995
Runtime: 106min

The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: WALL-E
text:
Release year: 2008
Runtime: 98min

A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.
